txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Ruffled feathers from the hendrevail found throughout the northern North Downs. Deliver the items to Birgir Listmaster at Othrikar.
'I have marked this task as complete. We are grateful.'
'We require a collection of feathers from the hendrevail. You will find them throughout the northern North Downs.'
Birgir Listmaker, one of the miners at Othrikar in the northern reaches of the North Downs, awaits the delivery of ruffled feathers.
Deliver the ruffled feathers to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar
You are on a task to deliver ruffled feathers from the hendrevail in the North Downs to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar. Othrikar is north of Esteld√≠n in the North Downs.
Wanted: Ruffled feathers from the hendrevail found throughout the northern North Downs.
